alert.note: Alert for Eddy; Nelson; Pembina; Western Walsh County (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued October 25 at 3:32AM CDT until October 27 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. There is a 50 to 70 percent chance for 6 inches or more of snow. Winds could gust as high as 30 mph, mainly Thursday afternoon. * WHERE...Pembina, Eddy, Nelson and Western Walsh Counties. * WHEN...From this evening through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Heavy snow rates could reduce visibilities at times. The hazardous conditions could impact the commutes this evening through Friday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light to moderate snow starts by this evening. There may be a decrease in snowfall rates and coverage Thursday morning before another round of heavier snow arrives Thursday afternoon.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Eddy; Nelson; Pembina; Western Walsh County
